original_title: Brand X: Live The Rites of Spring Festival 2018
overview: Brand X Live The Rites of Spring Festival 2018 is the bandâ€™s first-ever official blu-ray (all regions) release.  Lineup: John Goodsall guitar / Percy Jones bass / Chris Clark keyboards / Scott Weinberger percussion / Kenny Grohowski drums.  Beautifully mixed and edited by Stephen W. Tayler, the blu-ray includes 48\24 LPCM Stereo and DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1.
title: Brand X: Live The Rites of Spring Festival 2018
